basics.name: Subhadip Mitra
basics.label: Engineering Leadership, Technology Consulting
basics.summary: Accomplished Data and AI leader with 14+ years of experience driving innovation and transformation in diverse industries. Proven ability to build high-performance teams, develop and execute strategic roadmaps, and deliver significant business impact through cutting-edge Data and AI solutions

work.name: Google, Singapore
work.position: Data & Analytics Lead and Site Lead, South East Asia
highlights: Spearheaded Google Cloud's PSO Data & Analytics in Southeast Asia, driving projects with 100% customer satisfaction. Defined GTM strategy, resulting in  million in presales with new offerings. Upskilled team members on new technologies and methodologies, achieving an  GenAI Blackbelt certification rate within  months, establishing the group as a top global performer in emerging GenAI technologies.

Oversaw an X million Southeast Asia delivery portfolio in AI/ML, Data Analytics, Infrastructure, and Security, ensuring flawless project execution. Engaged with C-level executives to forge strategic partnerships and drive  million in PSO revenue. Implemented an automated revenue modeling system for running projects, decreasing forecast variance and improving deviation identification.

Led the development of comprehensive Data Monetization, AI Centers of Excellence, Cross Cloud Data Mesh, Edge (Distributed Cloud) Analytics & Martech strategies, increasing pursuit value across JAPAC. Developed a unified GenAI platform for a major telco and insurance group, improving AI service delivery and customer engagement with seamless multi-cloud interoperability. Innovated with a Multi-Agent Debate-based Decisioning system and an automated Cloud Architecture/Workload Discovery and multi-billion node graph modeling solution.

Drove key GTM partnerships with top global consulting firms, significantly boosting strategic alignment and innovation within the Data Strategy Pod. Aligned cross-functional GTM and PSO teams' sales plays with new service strategies, achieving YoY growth in services revenue.

work.name: Standard Chartered Bank, Singapore
work.summary: Data and Analytics Transformation and Strategy
highlights: Led Development of Retail Bank's Data & Analytics Platform and Digital Banking Martech Strategy: Managed a cross-functional team of 15 senior Data Engineers and Data Scientists across Malaysia, Singapore, and India to build and scale a data and analytics platform serving 11 key markets, 800+ batch/real-time source systems, and 1200 end-users. Additionally, led the formulation and execution of the bank's Martech strategy for Digital Banking, driving customer acquisition, engagement, and retention.

Accelerated Model Deployment with Self-Service ML Workbench: Spearheaded the development and implementation of an automated, self-service ML Workbench, reducing model production deployment time from 6 months to 1 week, significantly improving the bank's ability to respond to market changes and customer needs.

Pioneered Innovative Credit Risk Modeling: Developed cutting-edge credit downgrade and default prediction models leveraging news trends, social influencers for over 15,000 named corporate entities, enhancing risk assessment accuracy by 15% and reducing potential losses by $5 million.

Developed innovative risk scoring models incorporating alternative data sources, such as social media profile attributes, photos, videos, and neighborhood metrics, resulting in a 10% increase in model accuracy and a 7% reduction in loan defaults.

Defined technology strategy and roadmaps for Bank's External/3rd party data management, Data Partnership & Ecosystems, Data Monetization, Marketing Automation, Customer Experience, Data Privacy, Explainable AI (XAI), Data Sovereignty and Cloud adoption

work.name: Teradata / Think Big Analytics, Singapore
work.summary: Global Big Data and Analytics Consulting
highlights: Designed and developed 5 global Data Lakes with scalable ETL pipelines, handling up to 1.2 PB per hour and 40K daily files.
Engineered a low latency real-time in-memory platform, processing over 2.5 million events per second.
Built a real-time fraud detection ML system for a leading bank, reducing false positives by 60% and increasing detection rates by 70%.
Successfully built and upgraded multiple Hadoop clusters on Cloud/On-prem, ranging between 150-250 nodes.

work.name: UTU, Singapore
highlights: Built foundational services and partner integrations for the maiden launch of UTU in Thailand.
Developed a low latency (<25 μs) transaction processing module for bank mainframe integration.

work.name: Truckaurbus Marketplace, India
highlights: Scaled Truckaurbus from inception to operation across 15 cities, securing partnerships with over 25 OEMs, Banks, and NBFCs, achieving 240K unique visitors per day.
Architected the core marketplace and auctioning platform, alongside developing a dealers' lead generation network and ad-serving platform.

work.name: Microsoft, India
work.summary: Core System Development and Early AI Implementation
highlights: Contributed to the Windows Kernel Platform Group for Windows 7/8 and Windows Server 2012 R2 / Hyper-V, and MS Lync.
Developed early machine learning modules on Azure and enhanced the Azure Content Delivery Network.

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani, IN

certificates.name: Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect

Google Cloud Certified Professional Machine Learning Engineer

publications.name: Data Monetization Strategy for Enterprises
publications.summary: This paper details a Data Monetization Framework for enterprises to transform data into economic value, discussing strategic implementation, emerging technologies like AI, and related challenges.

publications.name: Open Location Proof (OLP)
publications.summary: A privacy aware open protocol to prove without repudiation an entity’s point-in-time presence, participation and location in physical or virtual space. GoLocate.Me is a planned implementation node demonstrating the protocol.

publications.name: OConsent: Open Consent Protocol for Privacy and Consent Management with Blockchain
publications.summary: This paper proposes a blockchain-based protocol for transparent personal data processing, enhancing user control and compliance with data privacy laws like GDPR.

volunteering.summary: GoogleServe is a month-long campaign to empower Googlers to volunteer in their communities.

Aa non-profit organization established in 1960, works in eastern and northeastern India, focusing on local ecology preservation, community media adoption, and health service improvement, impacting 1.5 million lives annually.
Vibha is dedicated to improving public education in India by implementing proven models of motivation, learning, training, and technology.

skills.name: Data and Software Engineering Technologies
keywords: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Apache Kafka, Apache Ignite, Apache HBase, Apache Arrow, Apache Iceberg, Quarkus, AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), REST APIs, Microservices, ETL Design & Development, Data Privacy, Object Oriented Design

skills.name: AI and Machine Learning Technologies
keywords: Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLM), Machine Learning, Machine Learning Operations (MLOps), Recommender Systems, Anomaly Detection, Risk Modeling (Market, Credit and Operations), Retrieval-augmented Generation (RAG), LangChain, LlamaIndex, Graph Neural Networks

skills.name: Technology Consulting
keywords: Solution Architecture, Strategy Consulting, Product Design & Management, C-suite Advisory, GTM Strategy, Cloud Migration, Stakeholder Engagement

skills.name: Engineering Management and Leadership
keywords: Team Leadership, Program Management, Technical Hiring, Cross-functional Collaboration, Strategic Planning, Budget Management, Resource Allocation, Performance Metrics, Mentoring and Coaching

skills.name: Languages
keywords: Java, Python, C/C++, JavaScript, SQL, bash

projects.name: Open Location Proof (GoLocate.me)
projects.summary: A privacy aware open protocol to prove without repudiation an entity's point-in-time presence, participation, and location in physical or virtual space. GoLocate.me is a planned implementation node demonstrating the protocol.

projects.name: OConsent - Open Consent Protocol
projects.summary: A transparent, fast, and scalable protocol for Consent and Privacy management built on top of public blockchains.

projects.name: ISO8583 Simulator
projects.summary: A simulator that processes ISO 8583 messages, a messaging protocol used by banks, payment processors, clearing houses, and other financial institutions.

projects.name: Heartohelp.us (Compassion Pit)
projects.summary: Created an anonymous chat system for online emotional support featuring a live Listener and Venter chat, profile, and rating system. Registered 19,800 users across 19 countries by 2012.

projects.name: Micromechanical Flying Insect
projects.summary: Developed a micromechanical flying insect for low-cost outdoor surveillance, utilizing swarm intelligence, piezo-electric thorax actuators, muscle wire technology, with onboard GPS and real-time imaging.
